title: A 'cosmic clock' in tiny crystals has revealed the rise and fall of Australia's ancient landscapes
description: We show how this "cosmic clock" uncovers the evolution of rivers, coasts and habitats.
content: We show how this "cosmic clock" uncovers the evolution of rivers, coasts and habitats.
